topic.title: 도서관 회원증 만들기
topic.description: 도서관에 처음 방문하여 회원증을 발급받는 상황의 대화입니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: 네, 처음이에요. 회원증을 만들려면 무엇이 필요한가요?
신분증과 주소를 증명할 수 있는 서류가 필요합니다.
여기 제 신분증과 공과금 고지서가 있어요.
좋습니다. 잠시만 기다리시면 회원증이 발급될 거예요.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Hello, I'd like to make a library card.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Hello, | I'd like to make a library card.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Yes, of course. Is this your first time making one?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Yes, | of course. || Is this your first time | making one?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Yes, it's my first time. What do I need to make a card?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Yes, | it's my first time. || What do I need | to make a card?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: You'll need an ID and a document that can prove your address.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: You'll need an ID | and a document | that can prove your address.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Here is my ID and a utility bill.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Here is my ID | and a utility bill.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Thank you. Please fill out this application form.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Thank you. || Please fill out | this application form.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Okay, I've filled it all out. Here you go.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Okay, | I've filled it all out. || Here you go.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Great. If you wait just a moment, your card will be issued.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Great. || If you wait just a moment, | your card will be issued.

keyword_speeches.target_sentence: I'd like to make a library card.
You'll need an ID and a document that can prove your address.
I've filled out the application form.
I'd like to make a library card.
Please fill out this application form.
I'd like to apply for a card.
I'd like to make a library card.

highlight_sentences.foreign_text: What do I need to make a card?
highlight_sentences.reason: 새로운 것을 신청할 때 필요한 서류나 준비물을 묻는 핵심적인 질문 표현입니다.
